title: Funding & Controversy Surround The Wing
description:
One byproduct of the Me Too movement has been the evolution and push for a stronger female community. Enter The Wing. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Riley Griffin who takes us behind the scenes of the women collective co-working space and details the future and the controversy it faces. 
FOLLOW UP
 Riley's latest report: The Wing Gets $75 Million to Expand Its Working Women Collective
You can follow Riley at: @rileyraygriffin 
---
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends
